Title: I think Harsanyi's aggregation theorem is my favorite theorem. I'm just a sucker for math that prove...
Author: Jake Koenig
Summary: I think Harsanyi's aggregation theorem is my favorite theorem. I'm just a sucker for math that proves something that one may have thought was pure "philosophy". Much better than GÃ¶del's Incompleteness Theorems. Especially because it has a happy ending.
